meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of muons.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the muonic properties of the particle.
meanings.sent2: The muonic decay process is fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The muonic cat seemed to have an extra spark of energy.
meanings.sent4: Her muonic smile lit up the room with its mysterious charm.
meanings.sent5: The muonic glow of the experiment left a lasting impression on the researchers.

meanings.sent1: The muonic detector was crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The muonic energy levels were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent3: The muonic sandwich had an unexpected kick to it.
meanings.sent4: His muonic presence in the room was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The muonic atmosphere in the lab was electric with anticipation.
